unsubscribe.feedback.title: You are unsubscribed

unsubscribe.feedback.reasonsLabel: If you have a moment, let us know why you unsubscribed:
unsubscribe.feedback.reason1: I receive the newsletters too frequently
unsubscribe.feedback.reason2: The content is not relevant to me

unsubscribe.feedback.reason3.newsletterN: Do you still want to receive our newsletter? Enter your new email address
